title: Afitpilot: Personalized Fitness Journey
description: Afitpilot provides tailored fitness insights and tools, leveraging somatotypes and RPE to create personalized training plans. Visualize progress with custom avatars and connect with a supportive community. Join us to optimize your health and fitness journey.

title: Akwanza: Fashioning Conservation First - A Mission Clothed in Purpose
description: Akwanza blends eco-friendly fashion with a mission to support the Big Life Foundation. Each garment sold aids wildlife conservation, reflecting the spirit of Africa's wilderness and our commitment to sustainability. Join us in making a tangible impact with every purchase.

title: Rate of Perceived Exertion (RPE)
description: RPE is a scale from 1 to 10 that measures exercise intensity based on personal perception, helping manage training loads, optimize performance, and prevent injuries.
